groupBuyingApply.applyNotice1: Please ensure the authenticity of the information, so that we can reach out to you after the application.
groupBuyingApply.applyNotice2: All your privacy will be respected and protected.
groupBuyingApply.successText01: Congratulations on your successful application for the
groupBuyingApply.successText04: ! An application confirmation email will be sent to you, please check later. Our staff will contact and sign contract with you offline after the application is closed. If you have any questions, please send email to

groupBuyingApply.successText07: , a group buying brand under OKCHEM.
